title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 11
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Life in Victoria, 4 special rings, Oscar the dog and the Melbourne music scene
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Kenton from Nundawading who just loves life and the state of Victoria; a woman who has four deeply meaningful Rings; Nairee and Michelle from Traralgon tell us about 'my dog Oscar'; and Adrian from Brunswick has a passion for Melbourne's live music scene.
